name: Helix Jump
description:
'Helix Jump' is a casual game. The operation of the game is simple, suitable for playing for a while in leisure time.
In the game, the ball will fall continuously and bounce when it hits the platform. Players must aim the vacant part of the platform at the position of the ball within the time when the ball bounces, so that the ball can continue to fall.
[Game Operation]
Long press the left mouse button to move to control the position of the platform.

[Game features]
The ball cannot fall into the special area of the platform, or the game will fail.
When the ball continuously passes through multiple platforms without obstacles, it will break down the next platform, even if it falls into a special area, the game will not fail.
The game will become more and more difficult with the increase of the number of levels. It requires certain skills to pass the level.
